author: DavidandRachael
title: Beautiful building
text:
My wife bs I stayed here let December 2016 and loved the place. This 100 year building was well appointed and the room we had was ample in size and cleanliness was great. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. They all spoke English really well and they new their end of Paris very well also. We found this a good location for the louvre and other art galleries. We were recommended by the staff a visit to the Christmas markets and we can say this was one of the highlights for us.
Can recommend this hotel to all.
